subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shaquille O’Neal helped the Miami Heat build a 22-point lead. And when they let it slip away, he delivered the go-ahead dunk in the final minute to defeat the Detroit Pistons last night, 85-82.
snippet: Shaquille O’Neal helped the Miami Heat build a 22-point lead. And when they let it slip away, he delivered the go-ahead dunk in the final minute to defeat the Detroit Pistons last night, 85-82.
